casebody.data:
Frank R. CREEDON, Housing Expediter, Office of the Housing Expediter (Tighe E. Wood, Acting Housing Expediter, substituted as Party Appellant), Appellant, v. H. P. WATSON, Appellee. NO. 12006. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit Nov. 18, 1947. Nathan Siegel, Sp. Lit. Atty., O. H. E., and Irving M. Gruber, Chief, Litigation Br., O. H. E. Office of Rent Control, both of Washington, D. C., for appellant. R. P. Watson, Jr., of Marshall, Tex., and Fred G. Benton and Fred A. Blanche, both of Baton Rouge, La., for appellee.

Before SIBLEY, HOLMES, and McCORD, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment appealed from is affirmed.
